assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Approval by an Ethical Board was not required as this is a systematic review of published literature. However, it was registered in the “International Prospective Register of Systematic Review” (PROSPERO) in 2021 (CRD42021238416; Available from: ExternalRef removed).
